mapper.select: SELECT ca.appli_date,ca.appli_start_time, mem.mem_name,mem.mem_hp, s.staff_name, p.pro_name,t.ticket_name, a.att_check FROM CLASS_APPLICATION ca,MEMBER mem,STAFF s,PROGRAM p,TICKET t, TIC_PURCHASE tp ,ATTENDANCE a WHERE ca.staff_id = s.staff_id AND ca.mem_num = mem.mem_num AND ca.att_num = a.att_num AND mem.mem_num = tp.mem_num AND p.staff_id = s.staff_id AND tp.ticket_num = T.TICKET_NUM AND t.ticket_num = p.ticket_num ORDER BY ca.appli_date,ca.appli_start_time
